<root><template><title>DISPLAYTITLE:listVehicleSensors</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game name

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of the sensors in the given vehicle's config (configfile >> CfgVehicles >> vehicle >> Components >> SensorsManagerComponent >> Components). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''listVehicleSensors''' vehicle </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_sensors = [[listVehicleSensors]] ([[vehicle]] [[player]]);
